memberdef.argsstring: (TDirectory *dir, int energy, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &TofMeans, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &TofErrors, TFile *outputFile)
memberdef.name: FitHistogramsInDirectory

briefdescription.para: Fits histograms in a directory and stores the results.

detaileddescription.para: This function fits the histograms in the specified directory using a gaussian function. The fit results are stored in the provided maps and written to the output file.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the directory containing the histograms.
Map to store the mean values of the fits.
Map to store the errors of the fits.
Pointer to the output ROOT file to store the fitted histograms.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &fileName, int energy, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &TofMeans, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &TofErrors)
memberdef.name: ProcessFile

briefdescription.para: Processes a ROOT file and fits the histograms.

detaileddescription.para: This function processes the specified ROOT file, fits the histograms in the specified directories, and stores the fit results in the provided maps.

parameterdescription.para: Map to store the mean values of the fits.
Map to store the errors of the fits.

briefdescription.para: Fits peaks in a histogram using TSpectrum.

detaileddescription.para: This function fits peaks in the specified histogram using TSpectrum and a gaussian function. The fit results are returned as a TFitResultPtr.

parameterdescription.para: String representing the layer and bar combination.
